title: EURUSD - Fundamentals to shape next move!
name: jamison_fx
contents: Sometimes its best to just stay away when we have news events, data releases or any other big fundamentals that can cause havoc in the market. I like to find a position and be in profit before any other influential impacts hit the market, if you siting in a trade near entry and something dramatically changes you can be left in huge drawdown or in a big loss, even slippage! Trying to open trades off the back of a data release is almost impossible to get any sort of consistency.. I still haven't got my short entry on EURUSD and I'm not just going to open a position for the sack of it, I trade off a strict plan and also encourage you guys to do the same! the market is risky and can eat your account up with a few mistakes, stay safe guys and good luck! ill be back on Sunday and hopefully have my voice back lol.

title: DOT AROUND A MASSIVE SUPPROT !
name: hadi_devil18
contents:
Hello everyone, HADI IS HERE
If you like the idea, do not forget to support with a like and follow.

DOT, as we can see price is over all bearish trading inside this channel making clean lower lows and lower highs

however, price is approaching a massive support zone , so what for now ?!

price formed a major swing high for the bulls to take the full control we need a break above the marked box with a momentum candle close before we jump in!

until that happens price is over all bearish and we can still trade lower and lower before going up again

and as usual follow your trading plan and manage your risk.

Be patient and good luck!

contents:
I have revised the triangle formation on Gold but the result is the same, we are still inide a triangle that may break up or down or we may see fake break out on both side, so my position is still shorting a bounce up to resistance or a break down of the support, it did not change from my previous analisys; RSI 15M and 30M are going to overbought level while 1H is neutral and 4 H is oversold, that tells me that Gold may have a push up to resistance at 1716-1720 and up to 1723-1725 or may pull down soon and break the support; I still stand on shorting the 3 different level indicated in the chart depending on where the price will move next; if Gold break up 1730 than the trade is invalidated and i will have to revised my standing on Gold

I TRADE HIGH LEVERAGE 5 TO 50 X NOT 1 : 1 // POSITION 25%-100% // MULTIPLE IN AND OUT

IF I OPEN THE TRADE I WILL ADD A COMMENT TO THE IDEA // DAY AND INTRADAY TRADING ONLY

MY TRADING RESULTS
# 28 TRADE PROFIT IN THE ROW
86% WIN IN SEPTEMBER
37 WIN, 3 BE, 3 LOST
CHECK ON MY TRADINGVIEW ACCOUNT

MY TRADING TIME 8 00 AM TO 9 00 PM (GMT+1)

title: XRPUSDT
name: Animator188
contents:
Taking a short on xrpusdt
Once a rising trendline is broken, that trendline becomes a resistance for the price. Similarly, once a falling trendline is broken, that trendline becomes a support for the price

title: #BTC is still trading in this ascending triangle pattern!!
name: CRYPTOMOJO_TA
contents:
Hi guys, This is CryptoMojo, One of the most active trading view authors and fastest-growing communities.
Consider following me for the latest updates and Long /Short calls on almost every exchange.
I post short mid and long-term trade setups too.
Letâ€™s get to the chart!

I have tried my best to bring the best possible outcome to this chart, Do not consider financial advice.

BTC UPDATE

BTC is still playing into this ascending triangle pattern currently it is at the lower support of this pattern IMO BTC will bounce from here but in case any candle closes below this lower support of this pattern then the chart will be invalid.

Stay tuned and donâ€™t forget to like this chart.
This chart is likely to help you make better trade decisions if it does consider upvoting it.
I would also love to know your charts and views in the comment section.

Thank you

title: Bitcoin Detailed Top-Down Analysis - Day 78
name: TheSignalyst
contents:
Hello TradingView Family / Fellow Traders. This is Richard Nasr, as known as theSignalyst.

78 out of 500 days done.

I truly appreciate your continuous support everyone!

Let me know if you like the series, and if you would like me to change or add anything.

Always follow your trading plan regarding entry, risk management, and trade management.

Good Luck!.

All Strategies Are Good; If Managed Properly!
~Rich

title: ETH  short rejection 1350-60 or long a bounce off 1315-21
name: giorgiovie
contents:
ETH has been rejected as expected from 1350 and now is inside a descending channel moving to the low 1300, i have not been able to trade today, but if i see a new opportunity i will trade later on this afternoon, my position is neutral i may go long on a bounce or short a rejection depending on where ETH will move first and the price action obviously; RSI 15M is overbought, 30 M is neutral , 1 H is oversold and 4h is going to oversold , we have two level of support first MO and than the neckline of the box , I think they will support another shack off as well we have two resistance on the upper side DO and the other side of the containing box that should limited a pushed up plus we have the two line of the channel, so i will placed my next trade inside this area ; we can get a two way trading opportunity short and long , I will check once a spot will open up and will open the trade on one of the two side

I TRADE HIGH LEVERAGE 5 TO 50 X NOT 1 : 1 // POSITION 25%-100% // MULTIPLE IN AND OUT

IF I OPEN THE TRADE I WILL ADD A COMMENT TO THE IDEA // DAY AND INTRADAY TRADING ONLY

MY TRADING RESULTS
# 28 TRADE PROFIT IN THE ROW
86% WIN IN SEPTEMBER
37 WIN, 3 BE, 3 LOST
CHECK ON MY TRADINGVIEW ACCOUNT

MY TRADING TIME 8 00 AM TO 9 00 PM (GMT+1)
Comment: 25% long open

Trade closed manually: Trade closed for a tiny 3 US Dollar profit 1323-1326, start to be late here and my trading time it is almost over i do not live trade open overnight ; this is my 29th trade in profit in a row

title: Short HNT
name: evasivesteering
contents:
HNT , a web3, is of the most performative cryptos recently having recovered 50% in 3 weeks since mid September. Actually, it was just a pullback because HNT had suffered a sell off with 85% of loss since April 2022. It's not suprised that the prices were rejected (again) by the EMA 50D.

On 4H TF, HNT broke its shorterm trendlines (so did the RSI ). It is likely that HNT will revisit its longterm trendline since October 2020.

The proposed setup is in chart with TPs (blue lines) and SL (red line).

title: â˜„ï¸XRP IMPORTANT TA â˜„ï¸
name: Rocksorgate
contents:
âš¡ï¸Alright so basically we're just at this important TA point and our markings still show just about everything I mean they literally show channels and the chart speaks for itself. We're at this important tug a war point which is always what happens before we get a big directional move as we've seen countless times already from past points like this we've analyzed and gone through. We failed to meet and come up again to our resistance marking. Here's the previous idea link and chart to view.


âš¡ï¸0.492 is our resistance and 0.486 is our support as we're seeing here and what mainly matters is whether or not we create a new mountain for this 200 EMA to enter so we can get that move up or whether or not we'll lose it. Personally it seems like we may lose that EMA if past price action has anything to say. Anyway we're at a pretty important basically and what happens next will determine a lot and the next trend.

âš¡ï¸Off from work so going to sleep now but if the market's anything to tell it's looking like a red day and that can definitely help bears in today's fight so keep note and watch those EMA's, especially on the lower time frame and if you'd like you can just come back to this idea whenever and hit that play button which will do just as good of a job of telling you with the 15 minute but if you're looking for a quicker indicator use the lower timeframes definitely.

âš¡ï¸Wishing well per usual and simply providing what I can, I apologize I haven't been able to give my best ideas and stuff as I usually do, been dealing with a bit from work and trying to sort out some life stuff but have no doubt soon we'll be running better than ever with pumping ideas out and October changes! If you'd like to leave a like or follow it'd be much appreciated of course, simply a Rock providing a simple idea and look on things as always.


~ Rock '

title: BTC Bottom or Leg Down?
name: NFVeej
contents:
Looking back in time we can see that resting on the top of previous ATH has been a strong point of support, I mean we have been 17 weeks or so rested here now!

Looking back in time we can see that we always have got the 84% (roughly) retracement soon after the 70% (roughly) retracement. History would put the probability high that happens again. I would certainly expect that looking at this chart.

That said - we are in oversold territory, we have had liquidations such as celcius, the pound fell out of bed completely I mean its been pretty bad out there, but has it been bad enough in the market for this to be the bottom? or near the bottom?

As always I am expecting it to go down OR up. I will never know for certain which it will go. Gun to my head I would go up looking at this chart. But it would be a first for BTC to not take that 84 step down. Then again, the supply is smaller this time round.

Lets see!

NFA

title: Lines to watch on the SP500
name: the_sunship
contents: All in the video, basically bears are in control as long as we're under the green channel trendline (which failed today), bulls are in control above it. Possible megaphone pattern may come into play. I believe the bottom for this year will be around the 3-4th week of October.
Comment: head and shoulders target reached

title: DAX 30 channel stronger than breakout pattern
name: Timonrosso
contents: As I mentioned earlier, Larger Channels are generally stronger than breakout patterns. The DAX 30 has been in a strong downtrend since 5 Jan which isn't slowing down any time soon. We can expect another bounce to around 13,064 before it turns down and makes new yearly lows to around 11,620. Thank you for the trading analysis suggestion, let me know if you need anything else
Comment: Also the RSI is showing lower highs and is also showing a bounce up before downside... This is why the current international markets are very difficult to trade at the moment.

title: XRP DUMP
name: PINEAPPLECRYPTOPUMPS
contents:
I see XRP dumping into the 0.36 area before the real move to the upside
This will signify the real test of the structure and from there bullish
impulsiveness will procceed

title: Descending Channel
name: Trazlo
contents: Our precious metal has been downing since Mar 22 in a perfect descending channel . Will the channel keep on holding the price or will the price breakout the channel? Today's NFP results may be our catalyst. Remember to use proper risk mangement. Let's download Success.

title: RSR - Mainnet Dump
name: sheggeh
contents:
Played out as expected in the previous post, hit resistance, tested support (.0088), not enough buy volume , so it broke below it
Current scenario with Main-net approaching in a few days, I believe it goes back up to .0088 with the final main-net hype then dumps back down to .0055 area
